sureRemoveCategory: Are you sure you want to remove this category? This will effect the related todos.
sureClearAllItems: Are you sure you want to clear all items?
title: Title
clickOnButtonToCreateTodo: Click on (+) button in the bottom-right corner to create new todo.
cleanTodoNotSupported: Unfortunately, Clean Todo is not supported for mobile devices
editOnDoubleClickDescription: By enabling this option, the edit dialogue opened when you double click on todo's text
alwaysShowDescriptionDescription: Show the description text on the todo's body
alwaysShowPriorityIconDescription: Show the priority icon on the todo's body
collapseDescriptionDescription: By enabling this option, the collapse/expand feature will not present. The description will be always expanded without the ability to collapsing it
includeDescriptionDescription: Include todo's description in filtering results
includeCategoryDescription: Include todo's category title in filtering results
includeDateDescription: Include todo's date in filtering results
importJsonFile: Import a json file to loaded into the application
